net.sf.mmm.search.view.api

Interface SearchViewLogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Refreshable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSearchServlet, GenericSearchServlet

    public interface SearchViewLogic
extends Refreshable
    This is the interface to access components and logic of the search.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      This method gets the SearchEngineConfiguration.

      This method get the display-title from the given searchEntry.

      This method gets the SearchEntryTypeView or SearchEntryType for the given id .

      This method gets the list of SearchEntryTypeViews sorted by title.
      Iso8601Util getIso8601Util()
      This method gets the Iso8601Util that can be used to format and parse dates.

      This method gets the date of the last refresh as String.

      This method gets the NlsLocalizer used for localization of the UI.

      This method gets the ManagedSearchEngine.

      This method gets the list of views on the SearchSourceViews sorted by title.

      This method gets the XmlUtil that can be used for escaping to prevent from XSS-attacks.

      This method reloads the configuration and the SearchEngine on the fly.

      • refresh

        boolean refresh()
        This method reloads the configuration and the SearchEngine on the fly.
        ATTENTION:
        The search-engine will not be rebuild on reload so configuration-changes only reflect the view and NOT the search-engine. This method refreshes the given object. This can be anything from reloading configuration to rebuilding the internal state. An invocation of this method may be expensive and should only be invoked as needed. The implementation of this method should be thread-safe if the object itself is to be used by separate consumers at all.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface Refreshable
        Returns:
        true if something has changed, false otherwise. If the implementation can not determine the change it should return true.

      • getDisplayTitle

        String getDisplayTitle(SearchEntry searchEntry)
        This method get the display-title from the given searchEntry. In advance to SearchEntry.getTitle() this method will create a combination of filename and the actual title and handle null values.
        Parameters:
        searchEntry - is the SearchEntry where to get the title from.
        Returns:
        the display title of the SearchEntry.
